inn1.comm: pacey delivery just outside of off and a huge "ooohhh" goes across the ground as Ahmed plays inside of the line
drops the length a bit shorter now in the same channel, with this one fended away by the batsman
peach of an outswinger on a length which Sarfraz fishes for, but is late on it as it nips away
strays on the pads as this fuller length is tucked away behind of square, or it appeared that way as leg bye is eventually called
just back of a length on and around off which is glided away through the gully region for a single

looking for the inswinger as this is nudged away to the on side, with David Miller at silly mid-on running full tilt to have a go at the non-striker's, who looked like he may have just been short as he dived back
starts with a length delivery outside of off which tails in a touch as it is defended by the batsman
tests out this Auckland outfield with a lovely clip outside of his off stump to this fuller length which threatened to duck in. Eased away behind of square to find the boundary in a hurry
reaches out to this fuller length outside off as the ball ends up near second slip, who picks up and fires in a throw when he sees Ahmed momentarily out of his ground
full delivery outside off which is defended by Sarfraz
advances down a few steps before tucking away the bowler through long on to pickup a brace
raps him on the pads as this fuller one slips down leg, but the umpire appears nonplussed as the angle suggested this was missing the stumps
weight on the back foot as this length delivery is jabbed away to the off side
succeeds in getting an outside edge which falls low to third slip as Shehzad played with soft hands
squares up Shehzad now with a full delivery on middle and leg which is squirted away to the off side
length outside of off which shapes away on the way to the keeper
fuller now, outside of off stump, as this is watched closely by Shehzad
keeps out this length delivery closer to the body on off stump, as the ball ends up near Steyn's feet on his follow through
gets away with an outside edge to this full delivery outside of off, with the ball ending up at third man
looks to push this overpitched delivery past the bowler, but Abbott is equal to the task
although that should help as he meets this full delivery with the full face of his bat to get this away through long off for a boundary. Also gets him off strike, much to his relief I am sure
has a go at this fuller one which shapes away as Abbott almost succeeds in finding the edge
safely negotiates this back of a length slanting down leg
nicely forward to this length delivery tailing onto a middle-stump line
looks for the drop single outside off but the close-in fielder keeps him honest. Shehzad walks up to his partner to have a couple of words
Sarfraz is two feet outside his batting crease as he worked this fuller one away to cover. Steyn would be fuming

too good for Shehzad, and for de Kock, as this back of a length is French cut away by the bottom-edge from Shehzad's bat as this continues through to fine leg for a boundary. Really fortunate that for Shehzad
punches away this length delivery through the off side now, but picks out the fielder
removes the bat to this back of a length which is fired through outside off
chooses to allow this full delivery outside off through to the keeper
length delivery just outside off which is defended by the batsman
fuller now, in the same channel, as this is mistimed to the off side by Sarfraz
manages to glide away a run through the slips to get Shehzad on strike
short and outside off stump, Shehzad lets it go. De Kock had to jump high to grab the ball
short delivery well wide of off which he gets away as this looked to stray the margin
gets well under this shorter one slanting down leg as de Kock completes another high take
tucks away this back of a length outside of off through backward square
short ball which swings away a great deal after pitching wide of off
slips one down the leg side as the umpire signals to the scorer
fends away this length delivery to the man at mid-on
full outside of off which is driven to the short cover fielder
finishes this short of a length in some style with a pull over midwicket which finds the boundary in no time
tucks away a single behind square to end a promising over for Pakistan
dabs away a run through third man to get Sarfraz on strike
fails to clip this fuller delivery on middle and leg
ducks under this steepler from Morne as de Kock completes the take to his left
gets his body behind this back of a length on middle and leg
tries to find a single on the leg side, but doesn't quite get it away
gets nicely on top of this back of a length outside of off to finish the over
driven firmly through mid-off, but picks out the fielder
this time tries to get away the off drive, but is picked up just outside the ring
overpitched and driven comfortably through long on as this just screamed away to the rope. Wonderful example of the straight drive

Dale Steyn is the man as he pulls off a breathtaking catch as he was running away towards long on/cow corner in an attempt to get at this mistimed chip over midwicket. In the end is able to dive with both hands outstretched to pluck this just inches from the ground, with his momentum carrying him forward as he finished like a killer whale on the stage at SeaWorld
pitches up on and around middle which is defended by the batsman
back of a length outside of off which is negotiated by Sarfraz
and he is off the mark thanks to a rare blunder in the field, with this one just behind of square. Able to get back in time for the second
full delivery outside of off which is defended by the batsman
tries to tuck away a single on the leg side, but it doesn't quite come off
gets wonderful carry to this shorter one which flies over the batsman to the keeper

in the slot as Younis caresses a drive through extra-cover, with the fielder doing well to just pull this back before the boundary. But the bowler has overstepped, but replays show there could perhaps been some leniency... actually, they showed the wrong one as the second one is a more realistic shot of the no-ball
was looking to belt this one out of Auckland over midwicket, but is woefully late
avoids this steepler delivered outside of off to end the over
shows some finesse outside off to run this one down through third man

drags the length as Younis looks to punish him through cow corner, which he ends up doing thanks to the fumble by the boundary rider there. And look who it was? Faf du Plessis walks away with a sheepish look
gets away with this inside-out drive through cover that just misses the close-in fielder inside of the ring
just class from Sarfraz as he uses the pace of Tahir to glide this through third man for a boundary
looking for the short-arm jab through midwicket, but is held by silly mid-on
this time punches away square off the wicket, but no can do
darts in one on middle which is defended back to him in his follow through
tries to steer past silly mid-off, but JP is too good
shorter length which is respected by Younis as this lands back to AB
too short and Younis is able to manipulate this through long off with a pull into the ground
nurdles away a single through the leg side now as Younis has looked settled from the get-go
short ball which is hooked through the gap at long leg to finish the over with a boundary. The AB move did not quite come off, methinks
slides one in on middle and leg which is tapped away to mid-on
gets away a jab square off the wicket to rotate the strike
shout for "catch" as this short-arm pull lands just inches from the dive by silly mid-on to his left
defended away to the leg side

guides away a single through cover with Younis Khan struggling at the non-striker's as he was prepared for the quick single. Sarfraz ends up sending him back, with the fielder, who is wise to the foul-up, firing in a throw to the wrong end
tries to hurry the batsman with one on middle and leg, but gets it a bit too leg side as this is eased away behind of square for a four through fine leg
drives the bowler off the back foot through long on first ball
advances down before readjusting to defend this away
just guides away the bowler down the ground to find long on
cut away through the covers as they run the single
struck away towards cover point now for one
defends this one back towards the bowler to end the over
struck back to the bowler, who fields the ball of his follow through
solid as a rock as he plays a traditional front foot defense
already the Sarfraz move has paid dividends as he dabs away through third man to find the boundary near backward point
sensibly knocks out a run through long on to get to the other end
tucked away square off the wicket on the leg side by Younis
looking to guide this one away off the back foot through backward point, but is unsuccessful in his attempt
drifts one in on middle and off which is respected by Younis
slides one down the leg side as de Kock fails to glove this, with the batsman running a single after the ball escaped him down fine leg
Sarfraz decides JP has to go as he gets nicely under this one drifted in on middle and leg to pummel this high over midwicket for six
comes down the track once more as Sarfraz has got Eden Park off its seats with another hefty blow, this time more over cow corner, as he makes it consecutive sixes
tries for the late dab through third man, but is a touch late on it as de Kock completes the take
darts in one which slips down leg as Sarfraz shuffled in his crease momentarily
sends JP sailing over deep midwicket as he moves to just two shy of a half-century. Sarfraz targetting JP here
wants the single through third man as he gets down almost halfway, but Younis remains unmoved. Thankfully able to get back before any real damage was done
nurdles away a single behind of square as they just scamper through with the short backward square haring on this
tries to force one away through the covers, but is unable to do so
crouches nice and low as he defends this on the front foot

comes down before clipping away the bowler through backward square. Was gunning for the second the whole time as the man at square-leg is able to pick it up and fire in a throw at the stumps, with de Kock doing the rest. Sarfraz put in a hopeful dive, but is well short of his ground. Sad way to end a promising knock from the Pakistani opener, who was certainly threatening to dictate terms here in Auckland. It was David Miller who pulled off that good work in the field
and he gets off the mark by easing away a run through mid-on
Younis happy to just block out this final ball to end a successful over for South Africa
length outside of off as they execute the drop single to perfection, despite some pressure from the close-in fielder at short cover, who was able to fire in a throw at the non-striker's
shoulders arms to this back of a length outside off which shapes away
bends his back to this bouncer outside of off

fuller delivery outside of off as they look to tangle with death with another drop single, which they are able to get through safely in the end as a misfield at short cover point takes off all the pressure
tries to guide one away through cover point, but this time decides not to risk it
hangs his bat to this length delivery which just angles away on the way to the keeper
clips away this one darted in behind of square on the leg side
steered away off the back foot towards deep point
round the wicket as he delivers one outside leg which is tucked away square off the wicket
driven away off the back foot through to sweeper cover
gets away with this slap, which he was looking to get away through cover, but ends up slicing behind to find the third man boundary
knocks it down the ground for a single to long on
fires in a short of a length delivery outside of off which is not tampered with by the batsman
dabs away a run through third man to get Misbah on strike
fuller one outside of off which shapes away to the keeper
short of a length which shapes away, as the batsman leaves it well alone
short outside off and called wide as you would have needed two Misbahs to get at it
overpitched outside of off which is squirted away through point
short of a length and jabbed away to point to end a watchful over from the Pakistanis
worked away off the back foot, but picks out the close-in fielder on the off side
Tahir unable to get to this as this is guided through to long off
turned away behind of square on the leg side for one
tossed up and on off, Misbah gets well forward and defends it towards the on-side
defended away to the leg side by the batsman
steered away through midwicket for a comfortable single as Misbah moves to 5000 ODI runs
fuller one just outside off which is turned away softly to the leg side
leaves this back of a length outside of off
another one which is allowed to fly through to the keeper
unable to do anything more with this fuller delivery outside of off, as this rolls away towards the off side
fends away this back of a length outside his off stump
nurdled away behind of square as Misbah wanted two, but is held to just the one
safely negotiates this slider from Tahir on middle and leg
gets nice and low to this one pitched outside of off
defended away to the leg side by Misbah
looking to steer this past the midwicket fielder inside of the ring, but to no avail
gets in a good stride as this is bunted away softly to the leg side
gets nicely behind the turn of this one spinning away to end the over
dabs one away through third man for a single
length just outside of off which is directed towards the man at mid-on
short of a length as he edges away the bowler to the right of second slip, who just about gets a hand on it in the end
this time glides away the bowler past the slipper to find third man
gets away with this uppish flick through fine leg, as the ball falls safely away from a chasing de Kock
misses out on this short and wide one from Morne
looking for the late cut, but is late on this
drags the length a touch as this is carted over towards deep midwicket
steers away a single through midwicket to get Misbah on strike

looks like AB was trying to get Misbah to hole out to Tahir at short backward square as he succeeds at getting the batsman to flick this half-volley on the pads to the fielder, but this just goes over him to find the boundary behind
driven down authoritatively through long off for a single
far too short as Younis fetches this from outside off before sending this with a tonk over to the cow corner boundary for four
sees out this full delivery on and around off stump
good running in the end from the two batsmen as Younis ushers in Misbah for the tight single when he sees the right-hander fail at this attempted clip through square-leg
just glides this one away off the back foot to third man for one
tucks away this back of a length off the pads through fine leg
unable to do any better with this fuller delivery than to find the man at silly mid-off
punches away this back of a length, but to the same fielder as before
glides away a run through third man to this full delivery outside of off stump
eased away off the pads towards midwicket
drops short as Misbah looks to pull this through long leg, but the leg slip is able to come round to his left to intercept

and AB has produced the goods after all as Younis, who was looking to guide this away off the back foot through mid-on, ends up getting a leading edge which flies over to the fielder at cover, who snaps it up gleefully. Younis goes as South Africa make a decisive inroad into this Pakistan batting line-up
tries to force away a drive through mid-on, but silly mid-on is all over it
once again targets the same region with a forceful drive, but is unable to get it away
gets away a comfortable single through the covers
punches this fuller one down the ground as this just gets pulled back before the long off boundary
is late on this length delivery just tickling outside of off. Also looks to have got some movement away
another steer down the ground which is timed a whole lot better as this just raced away from the chasing mid-on fielder
looks to deposit Morne through midwicket as the bowler goes for a half-hearted appeal for caught behind as Maqsood was late on the pull
full delivery which somehow avoids the off stump as this just bends away on its path to the keeper. Maqsood drove down the wrong line in the end
tucks away AB through midwicket as they get through for the quick single
nudges away a run down to long on now
jabs at this dragged delivery on middle and off, but finds AB in his follow through
short again as Maqsood is able to punch this past point
looking for a run on the leg side, but picks out square-leg
picks his spot at cow corner before heaving AB to find the boundary. Calculated risk that came off to a tee for Misbah
length delivery which nibbles away a touch from its angle as this is squirted away through third man off the outside edge
able to work away a run through the leg side to get Maqsood back on strike
ducks under this shorter one from Abbott
looking for a run behind of square on the off side, but instead locates point
has a lazy waft at this back of a length outside of off as he is soundly beaten by the pace of the delivery
sees out this length delivery on the pads to end the over
looks for the flick through square-leg, but is held by the fielder
delivers one well short and wide of off as the umpire gets a chance to stretch his arms
slams away a boundary through long on with a short-arm jab that went almost straight back past the bowler. Wonderful strike to find four runs
gropes out to this fuller, wide delivery which swings away
tries to dab one past the man at point, but ends up finding him after a couple of bounces
squares him up on and around off as this is squirted away by the Pakistan captain on the off side
tries to pierce the boundary at backward point, but Amla, coming round from sweeper cover, does a valiant job before the rope
short and wide of off as Misbah elects to not go hard at this
short outside off which is allowed to fly through. He shuffled over to the off side as that ball was being delivered. Did that the previous ball as well...
content to just block this one away to the man at mid-on
glides away a single through the gap at third man as this was placed well enough wide of the fielder to return for the second
gets away with this attempted bludgeon down the ground, with this one slicing high over to backward point

and Abbott has struck for South Africa as Maqsood has to depart Eden Park after slicing this back of a length outside of off, with the most minimal of footwork, straight to the fielder at backward point, who takes the chance comfortably
Misbah wants Umar to face AB early as he works away a run through mid-on
punches away this back of a length, with the short mid-off fielder putting in a fine stop. Just can't keep Rillee out of the action!
Akmal doesn't bother to just needle away the singles as he clubs this fuller delivery on the pads through cow corner to find the boundary
straying on the pads as this is worked away now behind of square
gets in a good stride before executing the tap-and-run outside his off stump to perfection
short enough for Umar to get under as he carts away the bowler through cow corner, but this time is unable to get it all the way
flighted delivery on the pads which he tries to paddle away through fine leg

drops it a bit short now as Umar is deceived by the quicker one, with this rapping the back thigh pad as he looked to belt him through cow corner. Goes for the appeal, but was definitely going down leg, and there appeared to be an inside-edge too
tossed up and on off, driven towards mid-on by the batsman
slower and just outside off, Akmal lunges forward and blocks
the wrong 'un from Tahir.  Akmal rocks back and pulls it towards deep mid-wicket. JP fumbles, but they decide to take on his arm anyways
flighted delivery and just outside off, Misbah gets well forward and blocks it
full delivery outside of off which is driven to the short cover fielder
steered down to mid-off, but can't pinch a single
full delivery on the pads which is flicked away through square-leg
driven firmly through long off, but hit a bit too well then he would have liked in the end
defends away this back of a length to the off side
tucks away a run square off the wicket on the leg side to end the over
on target right away as this fuller one is defended back towards the bowler
punches away this length delivery towards the off side
marginally short outside of off and Umar dispatches Steyn over midwicket for a well-timed pull. Greeted by loud cheers from the crowd as this traveled to the boundary
Steyn retaliates with a fierce bouncer which Umar is not at all interested in tackling with
short of a length on the pads which is tucked away through fine leg
tries to negotiate one away on the leg side, but doesn't quite get it away.
looking to guide one past Amla at slip, but he is able to do well to nip this in the bud
tests him out with a fuller one which Akmal looked to scythe through the covers as he got low, but was late on it
you just can't keep Rillee out of the action as this back of a length catches the outside edge to offer a chance to him at backward point. He does his best, but is unable to grasp the chance
rides on top of the bounce of this one pitched outside of off stump

the extra bounce undoes Akmal as he looks to target cow corner with another lusty blow, but ends up top-edging this to AB at midwicket, who is able to complete the catch despite falling onto his back. There was a moment where he looked like he might have grounded it as he had a look of astonishment on his face, but I have come to believe that not even AB can believe himself at times.
no need for a sighter as this is Afridi we are talking about. Straight away looks to hammer this short and wide delivery from the bowler over the covers, but is late on the ball
sweeps this one drifted in on middle and leg through backward square
turns away a run onto the leg side now
flighted on middle and leg as this is defended away to the leg side with soft hands
this time is able to steer it away through midwicket for one, and despite JP's fumble, they don't look to concerned to return back for a second
sees how short the boundaries are and backs himself with this powerful bludgeon over long off which just sailed over the rope
backs away as he winds up for another big heave, this time over midwicket, but gets far too early into the stroke as the ball ricochets of his thigh guard through to third man
looking to guide away a run through the gully region, but is not able to
directs away this fuller length outside of off past the silly mid-on, who despite getting a hand on this, is unable to prevent the run
length delivery which he looked to slam over cow corner, but doesn't quite middle it as this is pulled back around deep midwicket
looking to cart it high and handsome over the leg side, but ends up miscuing the stoke as AB, fielding the ball at deep midwicket, is able to get to the ball
now it is Misbah's turn to attack as he ramps this shorter one outside off past the third man fielder to the boundary
able to get away a run through the leg side now to keep the strike
short of a length and tucked away through to deep fine leg
full length which is straight on the stumps as somehow Afridi is able to weasel this away through third man thanks to the leading edge of the bat as he looked to defend leg-side
nicely on top of the bounce of this back of a length outside of off
dabs away a run behind of square on the off side as Misbah brings up his 42nd ODI fifty. Still looking for that elusive century though...
happy to duck under this shorter one on off stump from Dale
weaves away from the path of this short delivery well wide of off
shortish length outside of off which is run down to a squarish third man
begins with a fuller length on the pads which is eased away through mid-on
fuller length which he is able to squirt away past point
backs away before clobbering this length delivery over the covers for four. Was in a great position to attack over the region.
backs away again except this time he hammers it straight to the man at extra-cover
looking for the yorker but dishes a low, full toss which is struck away to the fielder at long on
full delivery on the pads which is turned away through fine leg for a brace
back of a length which he is able to ramp away to third man
Afridi wants some of Steyn as he pulls this length delivery way over the cow corner boundary for a huge six. Only went 73-metres, but it must have gone at least 80m straight up on its own

going for one to many blows as Steyn finally has the last laugh as he delivers a short ball which Afridi  goes after. He is cramped for space as this top-edge flies over to deep square-leg, who is able to safely get under it. Big wicket for South Africa as they look to quell as many runs as possible in these latter stages of the innings
shortish length right up in the that awkward area as he just about fends it away
looking for a quick single on the leg-side, but is held by the close-in fielder

looking to reach out and sweep this quicker one drifted in on and around off as this out right away as the umpire gives it. They decide to go for the review though. Looks like this definitely struck in line, and as it was low, there is every indication this would go on to hit the stumps. Ends up being umpire's call for both impact and wicket's hitting, but because the original decision was out, he has to go
gets away with this chip through long on as Tahir gets this floater wrong, dishing up a low, full toss instead on middle and leg
safely negotiates this one which turns in from middle
tries to swat away this low, full toss through the covers, but ends up finding AB at mid-off, with the pair taking him on, and successfully in the end
looks to dab away a run through gully, but no can do
is late on this quicker one darted in on leg stump as he looked for the flick behind square

backs away as he looks to clear the off side, with Steyn seeing this early enough to follow him with a leg-side delivery which is then tickled away fine with the angle to the boundary. Ends up being called leg byes though by the umpire
defends this length delivery outside off which is turned away to the leg side. Sohail was looking to get to the other end, but Misbah refused the run
backs away again before reaching low to this yorker just outside of off, with the ball ending up at backward point
short and wide as Misbah fails to connect with this cut shot through the covers

and the plan comes off perfectly for Steyn as Misbah goes chasing after this short delivery outside of off which he ramps straight to Morne, who barely had to move from his original position at third man. Misbah has to go as Pakistan look to blast as many as possible in these remaining overs
length delivery which he edges away rather streakily to the first slip
ducks under this short length on off stump
another steepler, going on a leg-side slant, as Rahat ducks under once more
short enough for the short-arm pull, but this is mistimed to the man at silly mid-on
backs away to try and scythe this fuller delivery through the covers, but is stopped by the fielder in question
short of a length which he is able to squirt away past backward point to get off the mark
back of a length and shaping down the pads as this is eased behind towards long leg
turned away to the leg side off the back foot as they scamper a single

length delivery on middle and leg which he tried to hit through the line to get over long off, but instead miscues to the man at mid-off, who is able to run backwards and to the left to catch this safely. Tahir put in fine work at the position as Pakistan go nine down
tries him out with a shorter one which Sohail is happy to get under

tries to find a single through square-leg, with Irfan backing up way too much as he is sent back by Sohail, with the throw at the non-striker's missing the mark. Would have been long gone had it struck
under short one which Sohail is content not to tackle
slips in the yorker on off stump as Sohail, looking to get a single to keep the strike, decides not to take it as Irfan was guilty of ball-watching as this one ended up near midwicket
plenty of chin music in these latter stages as Irfan sways away from the line
fuller length, outside of off, as Irfan backs away in an attempt to belt this over long off, but fails to make a connection
yorker on leg stump which is French cut away through the legs towards the fielder at long leg
looking to clobber Morne over midwicket, but ends up getting a top-edge as JP is able to get under this one swirling over mid-off to finish off the Pakistan innings with just two balls left

inn2.comm: gets some swing away from the left-hander just outside of off as de Kock defends it away

Irfan sets Eden Park on fire as he delivers a peach of a delivery outside of off which de Kock, looking to angle away through mid-on, ends up getting a thick outside edge as Sarfraz completes the take from behind. The umpire doesn't hesitate too long to give this one, as Pakistan have South Africa one down with nothing on the board
fuller length delivery and in that channel outside off. Faf prods across, lifts his bat and lets it go
elects to leave this one shaping in upon pitching outside off
bunts away this slightly back of a length towards the fielder at cover
straying on the pads as Amla is just too good to let this one go unpunished as he is able to tickle this away through fine leg
and he too has found a wonderful length and line as this one deviates away on a middle to off-stump line as Faf presented a dead, straight bat
length outside off which is left well alone by the batsman
slipping down the leg side now as Sohail goes up for an appeal, probably as a means to distract the umpire from calling this a wide
once again goes down the leg side as the umpire swivels round to signal the scorer
length delivery outside of off which Faf is able to jab away for a quick single
gets nicely behind the line of this length delivery outside of off
tries to whip this one away though mid-on, but is thwarted by the fielder
right behind the line as Sohails' first over finally comes to a close
full delivery which Irfan succeeds at getting a hand to as this straight drive continues off the ricochet through long off for a boundary

overpitched as Faf decides to blitz one away through the covers, with Misbah pouncing onto this at short mid-off before picking it up to fire in a throw at the non-striker's which has Faf well short of his ground. Ends up demolishing all three sticks on that end as well
shortish length which he is able to climb on top of the bounce of
looking to punch away through the covers, but locates the close-in field
short outside of off as this is fended away by the batsman
fuller length just outside of off which is left well alone by the batsman
cuts him in half with this length delivery outside of off as he was deceived initially by how close the line was to his body
short of a length which is defended back towards the bowler
full again, outside of off, as this is left alone by the batsman

steps over to the off side as Faf is struck a bit high on the pads when he goes for the leg-side glance. Pakistan looking to go for the review, but Misbah elects not to go for it in the end as time winds down
able to finesse a shot through gully to find the boundary at third man
gets across before defending the delivery away to the off side
short of a length which is allowed to go across and through to the keeper
presents a slightly angled bat as this short of a length is defended away
shortish length which is allowed to sail across to the keeper
goes round the wicket as Faf is able to run the drop single outside of off as a throw from point has Faf haring to the other end
delivers one wide enough for Amla to push away off the back foot as this is timed beautifully to the extra-cover boundary
goes back over the wicket now as he delivers a fuller length which is struck away to the silly mid-off fielder
short outside off and slapped away through the covers, but not well enough for this to reach all the way to the boundary
in the slot and driven effortlessly by Amla through long off for a boundary. Sheer class from the right-hander, who seemed to have all the time in the world with his fast hands at work
now shimmies a touch to the off side to target the vacant space at deep midwicket with a delightful chip over the ring
fuller length outside of off which is sensibly bunted away by Amla
short and width on offer as this is cut away square off the wicket to find the boundary at a rate of knots
short outside of off which is not penalised by the leg umpire. Surprising as I felt he might have given that wide
looking to force away a slap through the covers, but ends up hitting a lot straight to short mid-off

short on leg stump as this indisciplined bowling from Pakistan is costing them dearly in these early exchanges. Manages to hook the tall leftie through long leg to beat the boundary rider from deep fine leg with ease
short again as this time Faf miscues the pull behind of square to land up somewhere near deep fine leg
straying on the pads as Amla finds the deep square-leg boundary with the most graceful of clips. Just had enough on it to reach the boundary rope in the end
gets nicely behind of this length delivery outside of off stump
far too short and Amla gives this one plenty of welly to just guide it past mid-on with a pull down to cow corner
begins with a lovely length outside of off which is jabbed away towards the covers
good line and length which cramps up Faf as all he can do is work it away rather rashly to the off side
short and on leg-stump as Faf dispatches this one with a hook behind square to sail over fine leg for six. Just too easy for Faf as he swiveled in his spot to get this away
shortish length, going across, which is struck away towards backward point
looking to guide away this back of a length past backward point, but locates the fielder
too short from Rahat, and on leg, as all Faf has to do is dispatch this over backward square for yet another boundary. Pakistan bowling poorly in these early overs so far.
looks to slap away this slightly short length through extra-cover, but is stopped inside of the ring
finds the same man within the 30-yard circle as he continues to look for the gaps
this time slides onto the pads of Amla as he glances away a brace behind of square
played at with soft hands as this one travels through the slip region a couple of feet
far too short, with width on offer, as Amla backs away a smidgen before steering this away through cover point for a boundary
looks to glide away a single past backward point, but is thwarted by said fielder
moves over to the off side before defending away this length delivery back to the bowler
met with the full face to this fuller one shaping in on middle and off

Rahat succeeds in getting Faf to nibble at this shortish length which seems to have climbed a bit more than expected on Faf as he tried to run it down through third man, but instead feathers an edge to Sarfraz, who completes it quite easily
begins with a length delivery which is allowed to go across through to the keeper
gets behind the line of this length delivery on and around off, with the ball squirting away to the off side
solidly behind the line of this back of a length as Rahat finishes with a wicket maiden

and Riaz has taken the big wicket of Amla as he seems to have been surprised by the lack of bounce as he ends up giving a low, outside edge to the keeper to this length delivery going across. Sarfraz is able to get low to his right to pluck this with one hand before hitting the ground.
full delivery on middle and leg which is struck straight to the man at mid-on
short of a length which climbs rather awkwardly on AB as he fended this one away
tries to guide one away off the back foot through point, but to no avail
tucks away this back of a length towards the short square-leg fielder
tries to carve away a strike through the covers, but mistimes the stroke
Rillee bludgeons a strike straight back to the bowler, who tried to stop it in his follow through, but is unable to do so as this carries on through long off
manages to get away a single down fine leg
releases some pressure for South Africa with a blow over long on to this length delivery from Rahat. Just about manages to get over the line in the end
jabs away this length delivery outside off towards the covers
able to steal a single on the leg side with a stroke through midwicket
gets nicely behind the line of this length delivery shaping in from outside off
tries to carve away a single through cover, but is stopped by the close-in fielder

Riaz makes another significant inroad as South Africa are faltering in this chase of 232 as Rilee is set up for this hook over to fine leg, with Sohail Khan not having to move too far from his mark as he settled under it. Ends Rilee's short vigil at the crease as South Africa now go four down
tries him out with a full delivery on middle and leg which is defended back to the bowler
"ooooohhh" goes around the ground as he fires in a sharp bouncer which has Miller weaving out of its path
tries to steer away a run through point, but is unable to do so in the end
short outside of off as Millar initially looked to have a go before withholding at the last moment
AB pokes at this one going across him to the keeper as he looked a touch hesitant in going for it
keeping it nice and tight on that fourth/fifth stump line as AB fends away to the off side
short of a length which gets good carry off the deck as it flew through to the keeper
back of the length on the pads which is tucked away towards midwicket, but they can't pinch the run
clips away this length delivery off the pads as they are able to scamper through for the run
fuller one outside off which is defended away carefully to the off side
punches away this back of a length straight down the ground through long off
tries to steer this length delivery to the left of the bowler, who got down on all fours in an attempt to cut this one off
guides away this back of a length towards the off side

Riaz is on another level at the moment as he fires through a 138kph back of a length delivery which Miller looked to nurdle away through the leg side, but the ball ends up shaping away slightly on the way to the keeper
tries to work a single through the leg side, but is unable to find the space he required
fails to time away this slightly short and wide delivery through cover point, as the ball ends up nearby on the off side
looking to guide this one through cover point, but picks out the point fielder instead
moves over to the off stump before clipping away this full delivery on the stumps through fine leg
tails in on a fuller length outside of off as Miller plays outside of the line in an attempt to get this through extra-cover
turns away this length delivery onto the leg side, but finds the close-in fielder soon after

unleashes a wonderful yorker on middle which Miller appears to be late on. Looked out as soon as it struck really. Miller wants the review though. Replays show this went on to hit the back pad, so that may hurt his chances for this being given, but it is red all the way down, so Miller has to go, and South Africa are now five down with still quite a bit to do
fuller length and JP meets this one with the full face to steer this past mid-on for a boundary through long on. Played that almost as if he was wondering what all the fuss was?

times away this on drive to find the cow corner boundary, thanks to a comical fall by Irfan at the boundary as he tried to reach low to pick this one up before the boundary. South Africa will take it though
AB makes it two in tow as he takes this length delivery going across him and punches it away through cover point to find the deep cover boundary
another back of a length outside of off which is slapped away towards deep extra-cover
picks out the fielder at third man with a glide to this back of a length outside of off
full delivery which is fended away towards the man at mid-on
short delivery which AB hooks away instinctively to deep fine leg to retain the striek
tucks away Rahat just in front of square on the leg side
short of a length outside of off which is defended back towards the bowler

short outside of off as he looked to defend this away to the leg side. AB wanted the run as he backed up quite a bit, but JP ends up hitting this to the silly mid-on fielder, who is aware of AB being out of his ground as he fires in a throw at the non-striker's, but crucially, misses the stumps. Extra life afforded to SA there
short of a length which is tucked away through mid-on for a single
tries to get away a back-foot punch through long off, but Misbah, at mid-off, is able to do well to intercept this in time
short delivery which has AB weaving well out of the way as it flew through to Sarfraz
looks to steer away this fuller delivery outside of off through the covers, but is stopped by the man at short cover
initially looked to go after this shorter one with a pull, but in the end aborts the stroke
straddling on the pads as this is turned away to Irfan at mid-on, who is able to stop this after putting in the dive
short ball which cramps him for room as it shapes into him. Just about manages to eke away a run as he got bat on ball to get this one away through gully
another short delivery which this time is penalised by the umpire
gets away a single on the leg side with a clip. Had to really run hard to avoid any trouble from the mid-on fielder
jabs away this short of a length to Riaz in his follow through, who gets low to stop the ball from passing him
starts with a length delivery on the pads which is tickled fine behind of square for a boundary. Brings up the South African 100 as well
short of a length which raps the gloves of JP as he looked to fend it away
fuller one which is negotiated safely by the batsman

Riaz just can't be kept out of the action as JP, looking to hook this one away over backward square, ends up top-edging this short of a length over to Wahab, stationed at deep fine leg, who is over the moon as he falls away to the right to claim this
length delivery which AB is able to nudge away to the leg side for one
ducks under this shortish length on middle and leg to end a good over for Pakistan
length delivery going across which he somehow is able to manipulate with a shuffle through midwicket for a boundary. Wonderful timing as this went away off the bat
shortish length which AB is able to ride on top of as the ball catches a leading edge towards the off side
fires a steep bouncer which has Sarfraz jumping with every ounce of his being to try and complete the take

this is what AB is capable off. Out of nowhere he picks up this length delivery off the hips to find the long leg boundary with ease as this just sailed over the ropes. Outrageous strike from the ABinator!
goes round the wicket now as this one angles in from outside of off, with AB covering the line quite beautifully

steps over a touch to the off before picking him up again through long leg to just get this over the rope for a flat six. Unbelievable how that one carried all the way, but the short boundaries here at Eden Park certainly didn't do him any disservice
pitches it up on a channel outside of off as AB sees out the threat
manages an uppish slice to this back of a length going across as he is able to get over the second slip towards third man, with the fielder making a complete hash of this to let it through for four
tries to force away a shot through backward point now, but is held by the fielder
defended from the depth of his crease to this back of a length on middle and leg
eases away a drive through long off which just slows up for the fielder to pick this up just mere centimetres from the boundary rope
AB reaches 1000 World Cup runs with a glide behind square to third man. Equals Sachin at reaching the mark in just 20 innings, which is the fastest so far.
steep bounce on this short of length delivery offering from Irfan, which troubles Steyn, who looked to defend the ball before it ended up hitting the splice
waits on this one drifted in from Lala before cutting away through the covers
looks to turn this one which is darted in through the leg side, but pinpoints the close-in fielder
defended away softly to the leg side by Steyn
Styen trying to work one away round the corner as AB was adamant that he come through for the single, but Steyn is not interested
delivers the wrong 'un which Steyn did not pick as he shuffles a bit to the leg side, before the ball ended up going onto the pads
manages a single to this last delivery of the over to retain the strike
goes after this shorter one to get away a ramp over the slip cordon which finds the third man boundary, much to the relief of the South African fans at the ground
keeps out this length delivery along a similar channel as Irfan picks up the ball in his follow through
slaps away this back of a length straight back past the bowler through long on to pickup another valuable boundary
goes round the wicket now to Steyn as this length delivery is struck away towards Misbah at mid-off
has a wild slog to this short of a length as he looked to clobber Irfan down the ground, but is well late on the delivery

Irfan picks up his third as Sarfraz has proven to be a top choice by the Pakistan selection committee today. The keeper is able to reach high for this thick outside edge as Steyn looked to hammer Irfan over midwicket.
drives away Afridi to deep cover for one. Exposes Abbott in the process
darted in on leg as Abbott fends this one away to the bowler
tries to force one away on the off side, but picks out the close-in fielder within the ring
looks to defend off the front foot but gets beaten
drags the length as Abbott fails to punish him away through the off side
keeps out this final delivery to get AB back on the hot seat
AB livin' la vida loca as he looks to go over cow corner, but ends up getting a top-edge which falls just out of reach of the midwicket fielder
manages to get to the other end with a clip through the same region
backs away in an attempt to try and crash him through the covers, but soon after Irfan pulls up as he signals that he is having some trouble with the back of his right leg
Irfan looked a touch ungainly as he delivered that ball, but is not punished as it ends up near his feet in the end
short and pulled fiercely by AB as midwicket fails to pick this up before the sweeper at deep midwicket came round to field the ball
shortish length going across which is allowed to scream through to the keeper
slides one in on middle and off which is defended away to extra-cover

strikes AB on the full outside off, with Afridi going straight up for it. The keeper and captain have come to discuss the prospect of taking a review, which they end up doing. Replays confirm that this did indeed land outside off before turning away. He was also quite a long way down, so it would have been harsh to have given it anyways. Wasted review for Pakistan there
flighted just outside off as this is struck back to the bowler
strays down the leg side as Abbott gets a tiny inside-edge before rushing past Sarfraz and the short backward square fielder to the boundary at fine leg
gets his body solidly behind the line of this Afridi special
picks up a single off the last ball with a drive down to long off
length delivery outside of off which they are able to steal a run to as this one is dead-batted close to the body, with no one bothered to come forward to put pressure
slashes hard at this full delivery outside off as he just gets it up and over backward point to pickup four
short of a length which is punched away through long off for one
short, outside of off, as Abbott weaves well out of its line
short ball which is defended away close to the body on the off side
keeps out this short of a length which shapes in on him
picks up a single through long on
crouches nice and low to keep out this one on middle and off
steers down Afridi to long on to get AB on strike
calculated risk from AB which comes off beautifully as he sacheys down to tonk this over long off to bring up his fifty. Has been a wonderful knock so far, but he still has plenty to do
this time targets backward square with a powerful lofted sweep to this one slid in by Afridi. Had enough elevation on it to go over the rope comfortably
drives one on the up to the silly mid-off fielder to end a productive over for South Africa
easy as you like as he punches away this Rahat delivery through long off for a boundary

and Rahat plucks a big wicket as Abbott feathers an outside edge to this back of a length, with Younis taking a wonderful catch at second slip as he got low to his left. That could be huge as South Africa are still adrift by 60 runs
elects to leave this length delivery outside off stump
length delivery which is fended away softly on the leg side, as he is mindful of the close-in fielder in the vicinity
doesn't bother to tamper with this shortish length flying through outside off stump
slaps away Rahat square off the wicket on the off side, much to the jubilation of the South African ranks both in the dressing room and at the ground
gets away with an uppish strike through the off side as AB tells Morne to hang tight at his end
allows this length delivery to go through to the keeper

goes down the pitch before blitzing this length delivery through long on, with the mid-on fielder, who was up in the circle, running hard to his right and back to try and cut this off, before putting in a fruitless dive as this continued on to the boundary. Didn't really middle it, but if AB wants a boundary, AB gets a boundary
AB elects to take the single with a blow down the ground to long on
Morne pushes at this length delivery towards mid-off as he just makes his ground at the other end before the throw from the fielder. Gets AB back on strike
searching for the yorker as he instead offers a low, full toss down the leg side which is helped away by AB through square-leg

bangs in a short delivery which is given a wide by the leg umpire. It's kind of funny because Wasim was asked just before what he would have done, and he specifically said not to bowl that kind of delivery, which Sohail naturally ended up doing anyways
fires in a good length which raps the top of the pads of Morne as he looked to defend
goes round the wicket to AB as he gets away a shot through third man. Doesn't bother to run though
AB is just too good. Riaz offers a low, full toss and you just can't bowl like this to him, as he smokes this high over midwicket to pick up a valuable six
keeps out this back of a length from round the wicket
looking to attack long on, but instead gets a top-edge which flies high to deep extra-cover, with the ball having enough on it to reach the boundary after a couple of bounces
shows his finesses with a glide outside off through third man. Morkel back on now to face the final ball of the over
short delivery which is dabbed down to third man, reaching the fielder after one bounce, but he was able to hold on to it despite overrunning just a touch
gets a thick outside edge outside off as he looked to hammer Sohail through the covers, with the resulting edge flying away to the third man boundary

AB comes down the track to this short delivery, with the intention of blasting this over long on, but ends up feathering an outside edge to Sarfraz, who has been safe as houses behind the stumps. That could be the end for South Africa as AB departs for a courageous 77
tries to dab one through third man, but was never really in position for the shot
looked to glance away Sohail through fine leg, but fails to make any connection. Called wide as Sohail and the umpire feigned the appeal
how did that not strike the base of middle? delivers a wonderful yorker which is just dug out, but only at the very last moment
short ball which has Tahir bending his back to avoid the delivery
has a late waft at this length delivery outside of off, with this one flying through to the keeper in the end
ramps away this short of a length outside off to third man
round the wicket to Tahir as he gropes at this fuller length, but is late on it

and it is all over as Pakistan romp to a famous 29-run victory (D/L) at Eden Park! Tahir was looking to simply get bat on ball to this fast delivery outside off, before offering a chance to Sarfraz, who has now broken the record for most catches in an ODI by a Pakistani wicketkeeper, picking up the record-breaking catch with this effort
